attributes.action: That the government should call for an immediate ceasefire in Afghanistan and all party peace talks
attributes.additional_details:
Operation 'Enduring Freedom' has endured for 10 years, longer than World Wars l & ll together etc

Grounds for rejection wrong (eg another petition already to this effect)

1.  There is no other petition on site to this effect at all
2.  On site there are many petitons which have similar statements on other subjects eg capital punishment (about 15)
3 I note there are sveral on site with respect to Afghanistan which are similar but none calling for an end to war, troops home, ceasefire, peace talks
4 several suggesting this have been rejected
5 conclusion reason for rejection political and nothing else

rejection.details: These comments have been forwarded to the responsible owners of the e-petition site.
